#summary How to use the drag and drop plugin with GWT widgets

= Introduction =
----
The draggable and droppable plugins of gwtquery allows to make any DOM elements draggable and droppable. In addition, it offers a API in order to add drag and drop support to your GWT widgets.

This article explains how to use this API in your GWT project.
